title: Coconut Cream Pie  III
directions: Mix together sugar, flour, and nutmeg.   Beat in eggs.  Add milk and butter or margarine, and stir.  Stir in coconut.  Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees ) for 25 minutes.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
